rulesStrings.li: questDescription->Your colony has activated a Zero Point Module (ZPM) at [map_definite]. Its archotech-grade power signature is impossible to hide; hostile powers capable of [zpmDetectionMethod] are converging to seize it. Keep the ZPM online and defend the site against recurring assaults.\n\nIf the ZPM is uninstalled or destroyed, the signal will cease and the attacks will stop.[raidsDescription]

raidsDescription(allowViolence==true)->\n\nRival factions will dispatch strike teams approximately every [raidIntervalAvg_duration], escalating as long as the ZPM remains active. You’ll have a short window to harden defenses before the first strike. Expect opportunists, warlords, and ancient enemies to stake their claim to “limitless power.”
zpmDetectionMethod->picking up the ZPM’s subspace power bleed on long-range sensors
zpmDetectionMethod->triangulating the constant high-energy resonance pulsing through the ionosphere
zpmDetectionMethod->following the unnatural aurora — a light that never dims above your base
